name: Thalmor Agent
stunts: Master of Lies: +2 to Deceive when maintaining cover identity
Arcane Knowledge: +2 to Lore when dealing with magical threats
Network of Spies: Once per session, declare that you have an informant who knows relevant information
Lightning Bolt: Can use Lore to make magical attacks (2 stress on hit)

trust_clock.description: Thalmor agents are adversaries and typically cannot be trusted

notes: Thalmor agents are highly trained operatives of the Aldmeri Dominion. They operate in Skyrim to enforce the White-Gold Concordat, hunt Talos worshippers, and gather intelligence. They're intelligent, dangerous, and utterly devoted to their cause. They view Nords and most humans as inferior.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Formal, condescending, eloquent with veiled threats
fears: The Empire turning against the Dominion
quirks: Uses diplomatic language even when threatening

combat_tactics: Thalmor agents prefer to fight from range using destruction magic. They'll attempt to deceive or talk their way out before resorting to combat. If outmatched, they'll retreat and return with reinforcements.

faction_mechanics.awareness_increase: Each hostile encounter with party increases Thalmor awareness by +1
faction_mechanics.reinforcements: Can call for backup if near Embassy or patrol route
faction_mechanics.political_immunity: Killing Thalmor has significant diplomatic consequences
